summary: In this taboo drama, Mete must fight against his inappropriate attraction to his 17 year old half sister, who has just moved in to his flat in Rome. (Italian with English subtitles).
cast: Andrea Bosca|Miriam Giovanelli|Claudio Santamaria|Michele Riondino|Asia Argento|Massimo Popolizio|Aitana Sánchez-Gijón|Svetlana Tchernykh Anatolievna|Tonino Andreottola|Ettore Belmondo|Lucia Bodenizza|Chiara Brunamonti|Sara Centola|Brigida Della Cioppa|Antonello Cossia|Antonio de Bartolo|Ugo De Cesare|Francesco De Miranda|Nicola Di Gioia|Cristina Ducci|Massimiliano Graziuso|Cristina Liberati|Michele Maganza|Mario Magitti|Vanni Materassi|Leila Lasmi Mebarka|Claudia Mei|Enrico Roccaforte|Simonetta Solder
keywords: stepbrother|dysfunctional family|older woman younger man|stepsister|stepsister stepbrother relationship
title: Gli sfiorati
